comment.author: 45262299@N06
comment._content: 700 Block of Grace Street. Was Logos bookstore for many years, is now vacant.

comment.author: 94896382@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vintage Supermarkets, Grocery & Convenience Stores, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 56077378@N06
comment._content: I worked at this Safeway in 1957 after school and on the weekends.

comment.author: 63179535@N03
comment._content: There WAS a similar Safeway in the 700 blk W Grace BUT this is  now Brooks Gray sign shop, 2600 block Hull St.   The facade is covered with brown sheet metal but you can still tell it's the same building from the side.  There was also a similar Safeway in Carytown where the McDonalds is now.  It became Pier 1 in the 70's before being torn down.  Pier 1 was cool in those days.
